title: Baking For Keeps
description: People have always said a way to a man's heart is through his stomach ...When Tamara Conrad goes over to welcome her new neighbor in her apartment building the last thing she is expecting is to come face to face with the sexiest man she has ever seen in her life. Too bad he reacts just like every other guy she has come across, not interested in the slightest. Oh well, just because he isn't interested doesn't mean she can't enjoy a fantasy or two while whipping up batches of treats.The last thing Mark Reese needs is the complication of wanting his sweet new neighbor, but with her enchanting his fellow firefighters with baked goods how is he expected to keep his distance. Especially when the moochers all want to get to know her better. Whatâ€™s a guy to do when food is involved?Book One of the Men Worth Melting For Series*Can be read as a stand alone with a HEA. No cliff hanger. Readers should be 18+ due to scenes of hanky panky.*Book One: Baking For KeepsBook Two: Stitching With Love (Coming Soon)~*If you enjoy this book, please leave a review!*~
author: Jela Clayton
